subject: Running
Track and Field
Athletics and Sports
Frauds and Swindling
Embezzlement
lead_paragraph: Tyson Gay says that Lance Brauman, who has not been on the track in the last nine months, is the main reason that the runner is a favorite in championships that begin Saturday.
snippet: Tyson Gay says that Lance Brauman, who has not been on the track in the last nine months, is the main reason that the runner is a favorite in championships that begin Saturday.
